item.title: By: Susan Boone
item.dc:creator: Susan Boone
item.description:
I'm finding Zendesk to be really easy to figure out and use effectively. I appreciate that it's much less complex (convoluted?) than what we've had in the past.
Thanks Tab, Andy, and Michele for running the pilot!
item.content:encoded:
I’m finding Zendesk to be really easy to figure out and use effectively. I appreciate that it’s much less complex (convoluted?) than what we’ve had in the past.

Thanks Tab, Andy, and Michele for running the pilot!
